lines.text: [last lines]
Hey, wait a minute! This isn't right. That's not the way it ends in my book.
Oh, yeah? Don't believe everything you read, brother!
This is the Voice of Doom speaking! Special bulletin! Flash! The sky is falling! A piece of it just hit you on the head! Now be calm. Don't get panicky. Run for your life!
Listen to me, everybody! I'm your new leader! I'm gonna save your lives! I'm gonna tell you what to do!
Don't listen to that pipsqueak. The sky isn't falling.
I tell ya it is too falling!
And I tell you it isn't.
Is too!
All right, if the sky is falling why doesn't it hit me in the head?
[Foxy Loxy hits Cocky Locky with a piece of wood]
Chicken Little is right! What do we do? Oh, Chicken Little, you've got to help us!
[first lines]
Our story takes place in a nice, cozy little farmyard.

[to the Narrator]
But I'm not a fox for nothing and besides there's more than one way to pluck a chicken
[thinks for a moment]
psychology! Why should I just get one when I can get them all
[starts reading from the psychology book]
to influence the masses aim first at the least intelligent, unquote, now let's see who looks nice and stupid
[observes the barnyard birds]
Cocky Locky? Turkey Lurkey? Ducky Lucky?, Goosey Poosey?, Henny Penny? Chicken Little?
[sees Chicken Little hit himself on the head with his yo yo]
Hey... ahhh he looks nice and stupid!
undermine the faith of the masses and their leaders, unquote
[puts on a bonnet, gloves, and a purse and impersonates a female voice]

Well I suppose Cocky Locky knows what he's talking about, well yes he ought to know, but listen girls suppose he's wrong, he's only human you know and if he should happen to be wrong we'd all be killed
[the hens start panicking and gossiping among themselves]

[looks at Turkey Lurkey, puts on a pair of glasses, and speaks in a sophisticated upper crust accent]
Now in my opinion Cocky Locky shows definite totalitarian tendencies, he's trying to dictate to us, we can judge for ourselves whether the sky is falling or not
[peeks over at the ducks and geese, messes up his hair and pretends to be drunk]
Say fellas I hear old Cocky Locky's been hitting the mash lately,
[hiccups]
yeah he's full of corn, his brain is pickled
[hiccups]
[Ducky Lucky starts spreading the rumor]
